name: Set of 6 lemonade Jars + Lids
description: AS SEEN AT THE SAN DIEGO EXQUISITE WEDDINGS MAGAZINE. Due to popular demand we are now offering the jars and lids together. These lovely jars will add charm to any party. Fill them with freshly squeezed lemonade or with any of your favorite cold drinks and top it with these sweet lids and straws and VOILA: A perfect and sweet addition to any celebration :-) Package includes: 6 mason jars 6 lids - Pewter or Bronze. Please specify on "notes to seller" Jars are plain (no logo on it) and measure 5 1/8" tall x 3". They hold 16oz = 1 pint. Lids fit any standard mason jars with 2 3/4" diameter thread. Does not fit wide mouth jars. These lids are made in USA. They are made out of tin with a food safe finish. Pewter or bronze look. These lids have a marbleized finish, they are not scratches. Care: Hand wash with mild dish soap, dry immediately. This particular item will be shipped via priority mail offering 2-3 day service to most domestic destinations and is insured.
